definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
Taiwan pr. used in 夾生|夹生[jia1 sheng1] and 夾竹桃|夹竹桃[jia1 zhu2 tao2]
to press from either side/to place in between/to sandwich/to carry sth under armpit/wedged between/between/to intersperse/to mix/to mingle/clip/folder/Taiwan pr. [jia2]

pinyin: jia2 mo2 zu3 zhi1 bao1 jiang1 jun1

sentences.english: A Christmas tree was placed in the comer of the brilliant hall. How beautiful it was!
sentences.chinese: 圣诞树放在灯火通明的客厅的一角，实在是太荚了。

sentences.english: The heraldic lion across the top is holding a cocoa pod.
sentences.chinese: 该纹章狮子的上方是持有可可荚。

sentences.english: However, not all coffee pods may qualify for your taste.
sentences.chinese: 不过，并非所有的咖啡荚资格，可以对你的口味。

sentences.english: Princess made way to her own sleep pod , and got inside.
sentences.chinese: 公主制造了到她自己的睡眠荚的路，而且进入。

sentences.english: I usually catch fish like mackerel and horsemackerel.
But most of those have relied on tiny capsules that are filled with a healing agent.
sentences.chinese: 但是大多都要依赖于填充了修复介体的荚囊。

sentences.english: The kind of peas Chinese often use in cooking are green peas, which are eaten with the pods.
sentences.chinese: 中国人经常煮来食用的豌豆，是连荚一起吃的青豌豆。

sentences.english: There are several good reasons people have in mind for creating and using coffee pods .
sentences.chinese: 有几个人有很好的理由为创造和运用到咖啡荚。

sentences.english: Virburnum Farrari's leaves dance happily in three seasons.
sentences.chinese: 荚迷花的叶子在三个季节里尽情舞蹈。

sentences.english: Everyone is attracted by beauty and beauty is powerful.
sentences.chinese: 每个人都会被美所吸引，荚有强大的力量。

sentences.english: The man who eats muesli lives next to the one who keeps cats.
sentences.chinese: 养马的人住在吃圆荚面包人的隔壁。

definition: root and lower stem of certain plants/classifier for pieces and clumps
new shoot growing from cut branch or stump
variant of 籽實|籽实[zi3 shi2]
